name: Dungeon of the Rogue Daemon
description:
A multiplayer roguelike for Commodore 64 and more!  (Work in progress)

Requires RR-Net or 64NIC+ cartridge, Ultimate 64, or 1541-UltimateII+.

The game is also playable online with a modern browser (Chrome recommended) here:  http://rogue.jammingsignal.com/rogue/

For updates see https://twitter.com/roguedaemon64
